title: fix a crash in header search completion with non-ASCII result
message:
fix a crash in header search completion with non-ASCII result

Now DataBase.getName() returns byte[]. This prevents the crash, but
still does not allow the user to actually search for a name with a
non-ASCII symbol: the request contains String which is not recoded
to byte[].

title: fix timed messages
message:
fix timed messages

Do not report that autoplay is canceled if it is obvious (onPause())
or make the message more specific (end of variation).

Do not propagate dispatchTouchEvent if it was used to cancel autoplay.

Prevent "Time is up!" if the board is not in foreground
(add cancelHumanThinkingTimer() to onPause()).

title: US spelling
message:
US spelling

cancelled -> canceled

title: allow to limit the thinking time in study mode
message:
allow to limit the thinking time in study mode

Add time_is_up.wav (generated by Audacity plug-in Metronome).

Add canUndoMove to ChessController.

title: one-touch mode change
message:
one-touch mode change

If enabled (true by default), one can touch the game status (the
line above the view with game notation) to change mode: review on the
left, analysis in the middle, and study on the right.

title: prevent confusion with auto play
message:
prevent confusion with auto play

Notify the user that the autoplay is started and how to stop it (any interaction).

Notify the user that the autoplay is stopped.

Hint the user that onNextMoveLongClick does nothing in the end of variation.

At least on VirtualBox, onUserInteraction() is called on touch-up of
the long click that started autoplay, so we keep track of time when
the autoplay was started to ignore that spurious call.

message: Change auto play: enable auto play on long click on next move, disable auto play on next or previous move click. Previously it was needed to keep pressing the next move.

title: Russian translation
message: Russian translation

title: i18n
message:
i18n

Use @string everywhere.

settings => preferences

... => horizontal ellipsis

Proper capitalization.

Make string/filter_number_of_games a format.

Expanded description of features and hints.

Remove unused strings.

Better explanation of string/err_too_few_spaces.

title: allow cancel during reading index file
message: allow cancel during reading index file

title: better handling of unknown ELO in searchHeader
message:
better handling of unknown ELO in searchHeader

If user does not care about ELO of Black, then we should not care
whether Black ELO is known, that is allowUnknownElo is relevant only
if a range is specified for some parameter (say, Black ELO), and this
parameter is unknown.

Optimize searchHeader by checking only active ranges, for example, if
there is no ELO range specified then we should not check ELO at all.

title: resolve non-Unicode warnings in strings.xml
message: resolve non-Unicode warnings in strings.xml

title: unify names of search activities
message: unify names of search activities

title: finish FavoritesSearchActivity if there are no favorites
message: finish FavoritesSearchActivity if there are no favorites

title: show progress in search during reading of the index file
message:
show progress in search during reading of the index file

Before this, in a huge database the first search is hung with 0
progress all the time while the index file is read. Now we read index
with progress, instead of doing it silently.

As a side-effect, on the first search progress goes 0..100 twice with
the same title, but it is better than the progress hang on 0.

The index reading is not cancelable.

title: add filter operation "subtract from filter"
message:
add filter operation "subtract from filter"

Unify searchBoard and searchHeader.

Inline matchGameHeader (a function with 30 parameters) and
matchGameFlags.

title: allow to make game favorite on wrong move
message:
allow to make game favorite on wrong move

If this option is enabled, then if a wrong move is attempted in study
mode, the game is automatically marked as favorite. This is useful to
be able to review problems in which user made mistakes.

title: allow to invert is-favorite by touching the favorite rating
message:
allow to invert is-favorite by touching the favorite rating

Refactor handling of is-favorite and is-deleted flags.

title: add option to report thinking time in study mode
message:
add option to report thinking time in study mode

The time is reported then user does a move on the board.

The human thinking timer is not reset on a click on next or previous
move button (only on doing the move on the board), thus it is possible
to review the previous position (say, to find what was just captured)
and do not affect the timer. If the move is wrong, the timer is also
not reset.

title: add auto play
message:
add auto play

"Auto play interval" preference is added: if it is non-zero, then a
long click on next move button starts autoplay with this interval in
seconds.

One may argue that a separate button to start auto-play would be
better, but since users do not want smaller buttons, and going to the
last move in variation is easily done by clicking the move list, let
us try this approach (as a bonus, the preference makes the feature
easy to discover).

title: auto move delay for study mode
message:
auto move delay for study mode

Allow to set a delay, so that in the study mode the computer waits so
many seconds after the next game is loaded and do the first move.

Setting it to 6 seconds, gives CTS-like [*] experience.

[*] Chess Tactics Server <http://chess.emrald.net/Guide.php>

title: handle no database view opened
message:
handle no database view opened

Add hasNoDataBaseViewOpened check to next and previous game
buttons (normal and long clicks).

Disable item_goto_game and item_random_game with the rest of game menu.

title: more search header options
message:
more search header options

* Features

Allow to use either exact string or sub-string match in header search.
DWIM check box for exact search: on auto-complete it is set, on other
keys cleared.

Allow to search with sub-year resolution (year 0 means default zero date).

Add round, ELO ranges, half moves, annotated only, ...

Do not dismiss the search activity if nothing is found, most likely the
user wants to try again.

More structured item list in GameListActivity, add ELO information,
mark deleted games by red background of their favorite bar.

* Bugs fixed

In search header activity:
  fix IllegalStateException when Back is pressed,
  do not automatically open AutoCompleteTextView on restoreState.

* Internal

Fork gamelist_item.xml into chessok_list_item.xml:
gamelist_item.xml is now used solely by GameListActivity.

Remove GameInfo from DataBaseView and use JNI directly.

Fix singleLine, imeOptions, and warnings in search_header.xml (Unicode en dash, fraction one half).

Optimize ignoreColors handling -- do not call matchGameHeader twice.

Pass integers in SearchHeaderRequest as integers instead of strings.

title: fix confusion between gameId and game position in filter
message: fix confusion between gameId and game position in filter

title: refactoring
message:
refactoring

use SearchHeaderRequest to hold all searchHeader parameters

title: add request history to search header activity
message:
add request history to search header activity

Click Previous and Next to go thru the request history.

Long click Next to cancel the history navigation.

title: check position in SearchHeaderActivity.FilterableNames.getItem
message:
check position in SearchHeaderActivity.FilterableNames.getItem

Prevents ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException (unclear why
AutoCompleteTextView may cause it).

title: cleanup build files;
message:
cleanup build files;
release 1.35

title: fix board flipping when player names are empty and some names in games are empty
message: fix board flipping when player names are empty and some names in games are empty

title: fix new/save game: reset database view on new game and save game
message: fix new/save game: reset database view on new game and save game

title: prevent ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException (found on Android 1.6, emulator when…
message: prevent ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException (found on Android 1.6, emulator when pressing next or enter after autocomplete)

title: better handling of the search outcome
message:
better handling of the search outcome

If there are many results, then
 show them as a list (preserve the current position if possible).

If there is only one result, then
 if it can be shown (the found id is in the current filter), then
  show it and preserve the current filter
 else
  reset filter and show the game.

If there is no results, then preserve the current filter and game.

In all the cases, then the currently shown game is among the found,
make sure that we either directly go to its untouched state (possibly
updating the title due to the changed filter), or we can return to
original game by canceling the game list.

title: recover if the static DataBase was preempted
message:
recover if the static DataBase was preempted

The preemption may happen due to ScidCursor-related activity.

title: auto-complete in header search for names, events, and sites and optimizations
message:
auto-complete in header search for names, events, and sites and optimizations

Implement auto-completion in fields of the header search dialog (helps
to enter player names, events, and sites). Enter single space to see
the whole list.

Optimize for databases with several millions of games (tested with
4.4M games in IB1210): reduce memory requirements and do not reread
the files unless the new database is opened.

Preserve filter on activity switch.

Rework jniscid.cpp:
* fix possible memory leaks using RAII (resource acquisition is initialization)
* replace boilerplate code with macros
* remove redundant code
* comment out code which is not currently used due to UI limitations
* remove needless memory allocations and copying

Add missing functionality to jni/scid/

Rename org.scid.database.Filter to GameFilter, to avoid confusion with
android.widget.Filter.

Optimize memory use of GameFilter.

Remove filter and other unused functionality from ScidCursor and
ScidProvider. Known current users (that is, DroidFish) should not
notice the difference.

Refactor handling of onlyHeaders (parameters instead of state).

Remove src.org.scid.android.GameInfo.

title: add support of game ID range in search header
message: add support of game ID range in search header

title: add cancelable progress to import PGN
message:
add cancelable progress to import PGN

Extract ProgressingTask from SearchTask

title: remove restrictions on the game list size and make its load instantaneous
message: remove restrictions on the game list size and make its load instantaneous

title: add cancelable progress to all search operations
message: add cancelable progress to all search operations

title: avoid copy in ReleaseIntArrayElements
message: avoid copy in ReleaseIntArrayElements

title: remove ReleaseIntArrayElements from loop in DataBase.searchBoard
message: remove ReleaseIntArrayElements from loop in DataBase.searchBoard

title: remove Cursor support from DataBaseView
message:
remove Cursor support from DataBaseView

Completely remove internal use of content provider (it is still
available for external requests).

Since DataBaseView does not need to support Cursor interface we use
direct methods in DataBaseView, for example,
 String getPGN()
 boolean isFavorite()
 [...]
instead of
 Bundle respond(Bundle extras)

Remove unneeded caching of data (fixes several bugs caused by the use
of stale copies).

Simplify reload detection in GameListActivity.

If a filter is applied, the title displays game position and the whole
size of the current database view as well as position and the total
number of games in the file.

Toasts were added: Cannot go to the previous (next) game.

title: create SearchActivityBase and err_nothing_to_filter
message:
create SearchActivityBase and err_nothing_to_filter

SearchActivityBase hold common features of
 FavoritesSearchActivity,
 SearchCurrentBoardActivity,
 SearchHeaderActivity

If no database is currently open, searching should not be called.

title: remove DataBaseView.filterMap
message:
remove DataBaseView.filterMap

The database view prior to filtering is now handled by application.
Interface is more type-safe (remove conversions to String and back).

title: use DataBaseView directly
message:
use DataBaseView directly

Remove use of ScidProvider.

title: create DataBaseView (intermediate stage)
message:
create DataBaseView (intermediate stage)

Create DataBaseView as a copy of ScidCursor to be used in GUI.
ScidCursor is used only in ScidProvider.

This is an intermediate stage (4 compilation errors).

title: refactor
message:
refactor

Move common ProgressDialog handling from
 FavoritesSearchActivity,
 SearchCurrentBoardActivity,
 SearchHeaderActivity
to
 SearchTask.

Lift doInBackground query code from SearchTask into each activity
inner class as a preparation to further refactoring.

Move UI update in SearchTask to UI thread (to onPostExecute).

Simplify ScidProvider code.

title: "new Integer" => "Integer.parseInt"
message: "new Integer" => "Integer.parseInt"

title: remove DataBase instantiation
message: remove DataBase instantiation

title: remove "Signature" comments
message:
remove "Signature" comments

Apparently these comments are outdated and have no obvious purpose.

title: make all DataBase methods static
message:
make all DataBase methods static

Due to the native implementation, non-static use of DataBase is
impossible. Stating this explicitly avoids possible confusion.

title: remove gzip residue
message: remove gzip residue

title: remove TCL/TK residue
message: remove TCL/TK residue

title: remove platform-dependent conditionals
message:
remove platform-dependent conditionals

cd jni/scid
for i in *; do unifdef -UWIN32 -UWINCE -UPOCKET -DNO_ZLIB -UNO_GETTIMEOFDAY -o $i $i; done

title: Release 1.34
message: Release 1.34

title: move "Search" menu higher in the tablet options menu
message:
move "Search" menu higher in the tablet options menu

If there is not enough space for all options menus, then it is better
to make the "Search" menu visible, since it is more likely to be used
often than, say, "Share" (that mostly duplicates the long-click menu of
the board).

title: fix landscape layout
message:
fix landscape layout

In the landscape mode put the board on the right-hand side. As a
result it is now possible to, say, read a book in a browser, hit the
"Recent Apps" button and see the whole board on the thumbnail itself,
while previously the left-hand side of the board on the thumbnail was
obscured by the SCID logo.

message: change URL of "The Week in Chess Magazine"

message:
fix landscape layout

to make buttons easier to press.
